title: Login Server Not Responding
body: For some reason I cant login at all to LoL and its driving me insane! Ive tried doing everything I can with Internet Explorer and settings here and there and nothing works! Anyone had/have this problem and is able to shed some light on how to fix this?

replies.body:
Give this one a sus: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

If that doesn't help you any, submit a ticket to player support detailing your problem: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new (Having logs from the Hextech Repair Tool will help greatly with this)
